</script>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase uix_node_options}: {$node.title}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink nodes/uix-option, $node}" class="xenForm formOverlay" data-redirect="on">
<xen:radiounit name="action" label="{xen:phrase options}:"> <xen:option value="general" selected="true">{xen:phrase uix_style_options}</xen:option> <xen:option value="layout">{xen:phrase uix_grid_options}</xen:option> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase continue}..." />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}"> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1"> </xen:form>

<xen:textboxunit name="properties[{$property.property_definition_id}]" value="{$property.propertyValueScalar}" title="{xen:if $debugMode, $property.property_name}" inputclass="uix_iconInput" label="{xen:if $debugMode, $property.title}"> <xen:explain>{$property.description}</xen:explain> <xen:html><xen:include template="style_property_unit_extra"><xen:set var="$reset">{xen:phrase reset}</xen:set></xen:include></xen:html> </xen:textboxunit>

<input type="hidden" name="checkboxes[]" value="{$property.property_definition_id}" /> <xen:selectunit name="properties[{$property.property_definition_id}]" value="{$property.propertyValueScalar}" label="{$property.title}"> <xen:option value="0" label="{xen:phrase uix_circle}" /> <xen:option value="1" label="{xen:phrase uix_square}" /> <xen:option value="2" label="{xen:phrase uix_diamond}" /> <xen:option value="3" label="{xen:phrase uix_pentagon}" /> <xen:option value="4" label="{xen:phrase uix_hexagon}" /> <xen:option value="5" label="{xen:phrase uix_octagon}" /> <xen:explain>{$property.description}</xen:explain> <xen:html><xen:include template="style_property_unit_extra"><xen:set var="$reset">{xen:phrase reset}</xen:set></xen:include></xen:html> </xen:selectunit>

<input type="hidden" name="checkboxes[]" value="{$property.property_definition_id}" /> <xen:selectunit name="properties[{$property.property_definition_id}]" value="{$property.propertyValueScalar}" label="{$property.title}"> <xen:option value="0" label="{xen:phrase uix_above_navigation}" /> <xen:option value="1" label="{xen:phrase uix_below_navigation}" /> <xen:option value="100" label="{xen:phrase uix_custom}" /> <xen:explain>{$property.description}</xen:explain> <xen:html><xen:include template="style_property_unit_extra"><xen:set var="$reset">{xen:phrase reset}</xen:set></xen:include></xen:html> </xen:selectunit>

option.default_value: Our community has been around for many years and pride ourselves on offering unbiased, critical discussion among people of all different backgrounds. We are working every day to make sure our community is one of the best.

• Home
  • About
  • Forums
  • Downloads
  • Contact

Open the Quick Navigation
Audentio Design

The management works very hard to make sure the community is running the best software, best designs, and all the other bells and whistles. Care to buy us a beer? We'd really appreciate it!

Donate to us!

Wanting to join the rest of our members? Feel free to sign up today.

phrases.phrase: Admin control panel features such as iconator and drag and drop nodes.
Options pertaining to the footer are located here.
The list of icons and icon library to use.
For globally controlling node icons as well as inheritance of icons from parent nodes.
Settings specific to posts and messages.
Enter URLs for your various social media accounts to link to on the front end.
Show a block above the content of the site for important messages.
You can find your Affiliate ID by clicking here
Place your API key in this field to allow you to download and install ThemeHouse's products. If you do not know your API key, or do not have one, you can find, or regenerate it here.
Should we automatically check for updates to your styles? These updates will not be applied automatically.
Should we automatically check for updates to the UI.X Add-on? These updates will not be applied automatically.
Should we automatically check for unassociated UI.X Styles? This option will automatically be disabled one hour after turning it on.
Any additional CSS to load for the Iconator should go here
Hide debug stats for non-admins when debug mode is enabled.
The default icon to use for link nodes. Leave blank to use the style property.
The default icon to use for page nodes. Leave blank to use the style property.
The default icon to use for read categories. Leave blank to use the style property.
The default icon to use for read forums. Leave blank to use the style property.
The default icon to use for unread categories. Leave blank to use the style property.
The default icon to use for unread forums. Leave blank to use the style property.
This is the default page width your users will see. The specific width for each of these is set in the style properties, and is used for the page width toggle.
Check this option to reduce your query count and mysql server load. Only do this if you have last post avatars disabled in your styles.
After changing this value and saving the page please click here to rebuild the node icon cache.
This setting will globally toggle the ability for post signatures to be collapsable.
This setting will globally toggle the ability for post user information to be collapsable. In conjunction with style properties you can can set it so user information and/or avatar is collapsible.
Will alert for some issues with your theme relating to javascript (not finding the functions file, an out of date functions file, etc). Only recommend disabling if is producing false warnings.
Should the AD Iconator be enabled?
By default, shows a welcome section as a block in the forum index page.
Enter the full path to the favicon you want to be displayed.
Deprecated: This option has been deprecated as of UI.X 1.5.4.0 and will no longer function. It is left here for backwards compatibility and will be removed completely in a later version.
The icon class to use before the title of column 1.
The icon class to use before the title of column 2.
The icon class to use before the title of column 3.
The icon class to use before the title of column 4.
A CSV list of all of the icon classes to use for the iconator.
Full URL to jQuery UI. This is used for Drag & Drop Nodes
The path to the javascript directory to use if the above option is enabled.
This will prevent staff members postbit information to be collapsed.
Show an extended footer for adding descriptions and menus.
Show Welcome Section on Forum List
This will display the welcome section on the forum list page.
The number of days to keep the sidebar collapsed for. After this number of days the sidebar will be re-opened for the user. Set to 0 for indefinite.
Choose which social media profiles display.
Uncollapse sticky threads when first post is edited
Uncollapse sticky threads on new reply
Uncollapse sticky threads on new sticky
Uncollapse sticky threads when a stuck thread is moved
Uncollapse sticky threads when stuck thread is undeleted
Use same JS functions file for all Audentio Design styles
Please note: This should only be turned on if all of your themes should use the same functions.js version
Number of alerts to show in navigation tab dropdown
The number of alerts to show in navigation tab dropdown. Leave at 0 to show recent (Default XenForo behavior).
Number of conversations to show in navigation tab dropdown
The number of conversations to show in navigation tab dropdown. Leave at 0 to show unread (Default XenForo behavior).
Enter the classes required for the icon you want to use. Leave blank to remove.
Check to display custom html welcome section found in template "uix_welcomeBlock_custom".
Enable Welcome Section on All Pages
Shows a welcome section on all pages, not just the forum index.

Before {styleName} is downloaded and installed, we wanted to make sure you know what information we need from you. In order to establish a connection and verify that we are installing the proper product, we ask for:
  • The Board URL
  • The Board XenForo Version
No other information about your board is sent to us. The UI.X Add-on will be used to verify that all of the phrases and options necessary are available before download takes place. If you have questions, please do not hesitate to Contact Us before continuing.

Before {styleName} is downloaded and updated, we wanted to make sure you know what information we need from you. In order to establish a connection and verify that we are installing the proper product, we ask for:
  • The Board URL
  • The Board XenForo Version
No other information about your board is sent to us. The UI.X Add-on will be used to verify that all of the phrases and options necessary are available before download takes place. If you have questions, please do not hesitate to Contact Us before continuing.
Automatic install is not supported on your server currently. We are working on a fix for this, until then please install manually.
A style is already associated with this product.
Specifies how to divide column widths.
Confirm sync of style with UI.X Add-on
Divide last row according to lower number of columns
Divide last row into equal widths
Specifies how to arrange any remaining nodes after as many full rows as possible have been created.
The path to your XenForo root directory relative to the root directory of the FTP account you login as. Note that this requires a leading, and trailing slash.
If you want to manually install this style, use the following instructions
Invalid Audentio API Key. If you would like to install/update styles using the UI.X Add-on, please set your API Key in your Board Options.
You have provided invalid FTP details.
It is not recommended to modify parent styles. Do so at your own risk.
Your license has expired. Please renew it to install this product.
Make remaining nodes full width on their own row

1. Download the style zip
    1. This can be found in your Customer Purchases area at ThemeHouse under 'Previous Versions'
  2. Upload all of the resources for this style via FTP
  3. Upload it using your Style Importer, overwriting the parent style (not your child style) if updating
A grid layout can contain up to this number of columns.
The minimum width (in pixels) a column can be.
This is irreversable, and should only be done if you are sure this an Audentio Design product.
It appears that your styles and js directories are not writable. Please recursively chmod them to 0666 while installation takes place.
It appears that your styles and js directories are not writable. Please recursively chmod them to 0666 while installation takes place, or enter your FTP details below.
It appears that your server does not have cURL installed or enabled. Please contact your host to use this feature.
No download available for your version of XenForo.
No icons match your search parameters
Invalid License: Please make sure you have set a URL for your license.
Please confirm that you want to sync the following style with the UI.X Add-on
Please confirm that you want to delete this separator node
You have not purchased this product.
The maximum width this separator should take effect. Set to 0 for always

This process will associate this instance of {styleName} with the UI.X Add-on. Doing so will allow you to recieve update notifications, and also the ability to upgrade with a single click. You should only do this if you have never made any changes to style properties or templates in this style.

If you have made changes and you continue, you will lose your customizations to this style. Child styles will be untouched.
There are styles by Audentio Design that may be outdated. Click here to review them.
The path to your xenforo root directory relative to your FTP root directory.
This style is already associated with a product.
The UI.X Add-on is outdated. Please update it to get all of the latest features available.
Your UI.X Add-on is outdated. Please obtain the latest version here
You currently have an API key set, but it is hidden from view for security reasons. You can click here to remove your API key.
It appears that your server does not have the Zip extension installed. Please install the style manually, or ask your host to enable the PHP Zip extension.
